  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">En vinc</string>
            <string language="en">I've just come from there</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich bin gerade von dort gekommen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Je suis juste venu de là</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu vim apenas de lá</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sono venuto appena da là</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προήλθα μόλις από εκεί</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre la utilització del pronom feble EN quan ha de substituir el complement directe indeterminat. Conté una presentació informativa, activitats d'autoavaluació, pràctiques i un enllaç per saber-ne més. Les activitats es poden imprimir i consultar mitjançant el portal.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the use of the weak Catalan pronoun EN when it has to substitute an indeterminate indirect object.  It includes an introductory explanation, practice and self-assessment activities, and a link for further information. The activities can be printed out and checked on the website.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua catalana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengües modernes</string>
            <string language="en">modern languages</string>
            <string language="es">lenguas modernas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">morfologia</string>
            <string language="en">morphology (linguistics)</string>
            <string language="es">morfología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sintaxi</string>
            <string language="en">syntax</string>
            <string language="es">sintaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Gebrauch des schwachen katalanischen Pronomen en, 
wenn er eine unbestimmte indirekte Nachricht ersetzen muß. Er 
schließt eine einleitende Erklärung, Praxis- und 
Selbstbewertungsaktivitäten und ein Link für weitere Informationen 
ein. Die Aktivitäten können auf die Web site ausgedruckt 
werden und überprüft werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
l'utilisation de l'en catalanne faible de pronom quand elle doit 
substituer un objet indirect indéterminé. Elle inclut une 
explication préliminaire, pratique et activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, et un lien pour de plus amples informations. 
Les activités peuvent être imprimées et vérifiées le site 
Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no uso 
do EN catalan fraco do pronome quando tiver que substituir um objeto 
indireto indeterminado. Inclui uma explanação introdutória, 
atividades da prática e do self-assessment, e uma ligação para uma 
informação mais adicional. As atividades podem printed-out e 
verificado no Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sull'uso dell'en catalan debole di pronome quando deve sostituire un 
oggetto indiretto indeterminato. Include una spiegazione 
introduttiva, attività di valutazione di se stesso e di pratica e un 
collegamento per ulteriori informazioni. Le attività possono 
essere stampate e verificate il Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη χρήση 
του αδύνατου καταλανικού EN αντωνυμίας όταν πρέπει να 
αντικαταστήσει ένα απροσδιόριστο έμμεσο αντικείμενο. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες μιας εισαγωγικής εξήγησης, 
πρακτικής και αυτοαξιολόγησης, και μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες 
πληροφορίες. Οι δραστηριότητες μπορούν να εκτυπωθούν και να 
ελεγχθούν στον ιστοχώρο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">moderne Sprachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Morphologie (Linguistik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syntax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langages modernes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">morphologie (linguistique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">syntaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">línguas modernas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">morfologia (lingüistica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sintaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggi moderni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">morfologia (linguistica)</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
